an9.29:1.1: “Mendicants, there are nine grounds for resentment.
an9.29:1.3: Thinking: ‘They did wrong to me,’ you harbor resentment.
an9.29:1.4: Thinking: ‘They are doing wrong to me’ …
an9.29:1.6: ‘They did wrong to someone I love’ …
an9.29:1.7: ‘They are doing wrong to someone I love’ …
an9.29:1.8: ‘They will do wrong to someone I love’ …
an9.29:1.11: Thinking: ‘They will help someone I dislike,’ you harbor resentment.
an9.29:1.12: These are the nine grounds for resentment.”
